title: Saša Matić
text:
Aleksandar "Saša" Matić (; born 26 April 1978) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="pop-folk">pop-folk</a> singer born in <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>. He was born in <a href="Biha%C4%87">Bihać</a> and raised in <a href="Belgrade">Belgrade</a>, he graduated from music school playing piano. Matić acquired popularity upon his debut album "Prokleta je violina" (2001). Today, he is recognized as one of the most popular Serbian pop-folk musicians.
Throughout his career Matić has collaborated with some of the biggest regional performers such as <a href="Ceca%20%28singer%29">Ceca</a>, <a href="Severina%20%28singer%29">Severina</a>, <a href="Jelena%20Karleu%C5%A1a">Jelena Karleuša</a>, <a href="Aca%20Lukas">Aca Lukas</a>, <a href="Mile%20Kiti%C4%87">Mile Kitić</a> and <a href="Jelena%20Rozga">Jelena Rozga</a>, among others. He has held several concerts in the <a href="%C5%A0tark%20Arena">Belgrade Arena</a> and has also performed for <a href="Serbian%20diaspora">Serbian diaspora</a> in the <a href="USA">United States</a>, <a href="Canada">Canada</a> and <a href="Australia">Australia</a>.
Matić has a twin brother <a href="Dejan%20Mati%C4%87">Dejan</a>, who is also a well-known singer. Both him and his brother are completely <a href="blindness">blind</a> due to being born <a href="Preterm%20birth">prematurely</a>. Saša Matić is married and has two daughters.
